name: Bee Garden (Digital Art Installation)
description:
Bee Garden is a digital art installation painted by Alyssa Deck in Google Tilt Brush VR, and developed in Unity by Kurt Roembke, who also did the sound/music composition.  Kevin Brooks was the coding wizard on the project.  This is the beginning of a, hopefully, fruitful future of digital art games by the team.  Thanks to Artlink Contemporary Art Gallery in Fort Wayne, IN, for providing the VR equipment.

Please download the game via Mac or PC for best experience.  The WebGL version doesn't support the audio reactive features.
